Syntax::Utility::BinaryWriterFO

Syntax::Utility::BinaryWriterFO Class Reference

BinaryWriter Function object. For making the BinaryWriter easy to use with stl algorithms. More...

#include <BinaryWriterFO.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

BinaryWriter Function object. For making the BinaryWriter easy to use with stl algorithms.

Usefull for saving on typing when you need to write out a collection of objects. For use with for_each or other stl algorithms. The entrys in your stl container must be directly writable to the BinaryWriter.

Example: 

			BinaryWriter testFile(L"test.tst");
			vector<wstring> strings;
			//populate the vector with a bunch of strings.
			//instead of writing a loop to output those strings, you can use for_each and this Functor.

			//will write out all the strings to the file
			for_each(strings.begin(),string.end(),BinaryWriterFO(testFile));

			//file closed with testFile goes out of scope.
